Since entering the 21st century, with the rapid development of Internet technology, the network platform of ecommerce has also undergone great changes. With the rapid development of ecommerce economy, the widespread existence of credit risks in the trading process of ecommerce environmental goods has caused great harm to the healthy development of ecommerce, and has gradually become the biggest bottleneck restricting the development of ecommerce in China.Based on the basic model of ecommerce market, and proposes four types of credit mechanism to maintain social relations in the process of ecommerce environmental goods trading that is, credit mechanism without government intervention As can be seen from the experimental data, the Alpha coefficient of each potential variable set in the experiment in this paper is above 0.6, which is within the acceptable range, which verifies that the method model proposed in this paper to maintain social relations in the process of ecommerce environmental goods trading is effective in application.
